attributes.action: Teach English Values & History within our schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In our schools today they teach more on other cultures and history than our own. My childrens school seem to have assemblys on various other cultures and what they mean, I'm still waiting for a topic on english values. Children today should learn more about the country they are living in, why should we lose our own heritage just to keep other cultures and religions happy
